translation.en: [man] This is where it's at.
translation.zh: 源头就在这里

translation.en: -It's New York City. -[car horn honking]
translation.zh: 就在纽约城

translation.en: Street basketball.
translation.zh: 街头篮球

translation.en: This is our culture.
translation.zh: 这是我们的文化

translation.en: This is what we do, B.
translation.zh: 这是我们的天职 兄弟

translation.en: This is our job.
translation.zh: 这是我们的工作

translation.en: Yo, back in the day, it was like a big block party.
translation.zh: 回到过去 感觉那时就像大型集体派对

translation.en: [man] The atmosphere, the energy.
translation.zh: 那种气氛、能量

translation.en: It was just special.
translation.zh: 真的很特别

translation.en: [announcer] It's jam-packed out here.
translation.zh: 简直是拥挤不堪

translation.en: The players are putting on a show, and the crowds are loving it.
translation.zh: 球员们在精彩表演 观众们目不暇接

translation.en: [man] But AND1, they just took it to another level.
translation.zh: 但AND1把这一切提升到了另一个层次

translation.en: [announcer] AND1 basketball is sweeping the nation,
translation.zh: AND1篮球席卷全国

translation.en: becoming one of the biggest basketball brands.
translation.zh: 它正在变成篮球界中最大的品牌之一

translation.en: [man] Tokyo, Japan. Venezuela. Brazil.
translation.zh: 日本东京、委内瑞拉、巴西

translation.en: You know, it was pandemonium.
translation.zh: 你懂的 简直一片喧嚣

translation.en: [announcer] The competition is heating up.
translation.zh: 竞争变得愈发激烈

translation.en: AND1's newest sneakers are jumping off the shelves.
translation.zh: AND1最新款球鞋极为抢手

translation.en: [reporter] The line is not down the block. It is the block.
translation.zh: 排队购买的人挤满了整个街区

translation.en: [man] AND1? They had the best ballplayers in street basketball.
translation.zh: AND1？他们有街头篮球界最棒的球员

translation.en: And the best players get the best names. Like Skip 2 My Lou.
translation.zh: 最棒的球员才有最牛的名号 比如“跳跃我的灵魂”

translation.en: The Main Event.
translation.zh: “大人物”

translation.en: [announcer] The Main Event!
translation.zh: 大人物！

translation.en: [man] Shane. The Dribbling Machine.
translation.zh: 沙恩 “运球机器”

translation.en: [announcer] Get your Superman on, Shane!
translation.zh: 沙恩 快点变身超人吧！

translation.en: [man] We talking about Hot to the Sauce.
translation.zh: 还有“辣酱”

translation.en: We talking about The Professor.
translation.zh: 还有“教授”

translation.en: [reporter] AND1 is taking on the titans of the industry
translation.zh: AND1正在挑战行业巨头

translation.en: with no plans of backing down.
translation.zh: 并且不打算退缩

translation.en: [man] A lot of people today say, "Whatever happened to AND1?"
translation.zh: 如今很多人都会问： “AND1到底发生了什么？”

translation.en: I don't know what happened to it. And I was a part of it.
translation.zh: 我也不知道发生了什么 而我还是其中的一员

translation.en: [man] I could never have started a business without my education at Wharton,
translation.zh: 如果没在沃顿商学院接受教育 我就不可能创业

translation.en: but after, like, the second day there,
translation.zh: 但刚刚去那里学了两天

translation.en: a couple things became pretty evident to me.
translation.zh: 我就很快意识到了一些事情

translation.en: All my classmates were totally focused on what they wanted to do,
translation.zh: （乔恩亨斯曼大厅） 我的同学们 都在专注发掘自己想做的事情

translation.en: and I had no idea.
translation.zh: 而我毫无头绪

translation.en: I had probably spent four to eight hours hooping
translation.zh: 每花一小时的时间学习 我可能就得花四到八小时的时间

translation.en: for every hour that I spent studying.
translation.zh: 去打篮球

translation.en: [Seth] That summer, I did a free internship in investment banking.
translation.zh: 那年夏天 我得到了一个 在投资银行免费实习的机会

translation.en: I was like, "This sucks. I'm not doing this."
translation.zh: 我想： “这工作太烂了 我可不想做这个

translation.en: "I wanna do something that I love."
translation.zh: 我想做自己喜欢的事情

translation.en: "If every day I get to wake up thinking about basketball,
translation.zh: 如果每天起床时 我的脑子里都得想着篮球

translation.en: that will be a great day."
translation.zh: 那简直就是完美的一天”

translation.en: That was the genesis to go start my own business.
translation.zh: 这就是让我创业的起源

translation.en: I know the limitations of my abilities.
translation.zh: 我了解自己的能力有限

translation.en: I was like, "There's no shot I can do this by myself."
translation.zh: 我想：“我绝对没办法自己一个人做

translation.en: "I gotta find a partner."
translation.zh: 我需要个伙伴”

translation.en: [man] Seth and I met each other in seventh grade.
translation.zh: 塞斯和我在七年级的时候认识

translation.en: He came to me in college with this idea. So I said, "Yes,"
translation.zh: 上大学时 他跑来告诉我这个想法 我同意了 因为和挚友一起做生意 是件有趣的事情

translation.en: 'cause it'll be a lot more fun to do any business with your best friend.
translation.zh: 我同意了 因为和挚友一起做生意 是件有趣的事情

translation.en: Seth talked about this young guy that he met while he was playing ball
translation.zh: 塞斯说他在打篮球的时候 认识了一个年轻小伙子

translation.en: and that I had to meet Tom.
translation.zh: 说我必须得认识一下汤姆

translation.en: [Seth] When you play ball with somebody, you learn a lot about them really quickly.
translation.zh: 和别人一起打球时 你能很快了解这些人

translation.en: Tom has a 3.96 GPA at Wharton undergrad.
translation.zh: 汤姆上沃顿商学院本科时 平均成绩达到了3.96

translation.en: I'm like, "How's that possible?"
translation.zh: 我心想：“怎么可能？

translation.en: "Like, the dude's playing basketball seven hours a day."
translation.zh: 那家伙每天花七小时打篮球”

translation.en: And he said, "Just so you're aware, Tom's kind of a strange cat."
translation.zh: 他说：“提前告诉你 汤姆是个奇怪的家伙”

translation.en: He's, like, you know, looking down, not making eye contact, talking real low.
translation.zh: 他总是低着头 不和别人对视 说话声音很低 （汤姆奥斯汀 AND1联合创始人）

translation.en: But Tom was brilliant. And he was really the genius behind AND1.
translation.zh: 但汤姆很厉害 他才是AND1背后的天才

translation.en: [Tom] I grew up in small towns in New England.
translation.zh: 我在新英格兰的小镇里长大

translation.en: We moved, like, three times.
translation.zh: 我们搬了三次家

translation.en: I was a shy, quiet kid,
translation.zh: 我那时是个害羞安静的孩子

translation.en: and basketball was the thing that let me connect with people.
translation.zh: 篮球帮我和别人建立起联系

translation.en: [Seth] So, I talked to Tom, and I'm like,
translation.zh: 所以我跟汤姆说：

translation.en: "Yo, man. Um, you might be interested in pursuing a basketball business?" "What are you doing next year?"
translation.zh: “你有没有兴趣搞篮球生意？ 你下一年打算做什么？”

translation.en: [Tom] I had no professional skills.
translation.zh: 我没什么专业的技能

translation.en: I had only held very low jobs. You know, dishwasher, busboy.
translation.zh: 我只做过一些很低级的工作 比如洗盘子、餐馆打工

translation.en: So when I heard they were working on a basketball startup,
translation.zh: 我听说他们打算开创一家篮球公司时

translation.en: that was a lifeline for me, right?
translation.zh: 那简直是我的救命稻草

translation.en: 'Cause I just wanted to stay connected to the game,
translation.zh: 因为我想继续和篮球保持联系

translation.en: and I wanted to wear shorts to work. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我也想穿着短裤工作

translation.en: [Jay] We had the meeting at a pizza parlor,
translation.zh: 我们在一家披萨店开了会

translation.en: and we were trying to figure out what's the identity of the brand that we would bring.
translation.zh: 我们想搞清楚 我们创建的品牌是什么定位

translation.en: When you make a bucket, and you get fouled,
translation.zh: 每次你投篮 而且吃到犯规时

translation.en: 'cause you know the basket is going in, you say, "And one."
translation.zh: 因为你知道球肯定会进 你就会说：“再加一分”

translation.en: You don't say, "And one," you scream, "And one."
translation.zh: 你不会光说而已 你会高喊：“再加一分”

translation.en: -That's the ultimate way to talk shit. -It's like, "And one, motherfucker!"
translation.zh: 这是对别人嘴炮的终极方式 感觉就像是说：“再加一分 混蛋！”

translation.en: [Tom] And then I had this idea. We can put trash talking on a T-shirt.
translation.zh: 于是我有了这个主意 我们可以把这些嘴炮的话印在T恤上

translation.en: So I wrote up 30 slogans, and I was like, "This is our first shirt."
translation.zh: 于是我写下将近30个口号 我心想：“这是我们的第一件T恤”

translation.en: "I'm sorry I thought you could play."
translation.zh: “抱歉 我以为你会打呢”

translation.en: "I'm the bus driver. I take everyone to school."
translation.zh: “我是巴士司机 我带所有人去上课”

translation.en: "Wear a collar. You just got dogged."
translation.zh: “戴上颈圈吧 你被打成狗了”

translation.en: Probably the most famous one, which is, "Your game is as ugly as your girl."
translation.zh: 最有名的一个就是 “你打得和你女朋友一样难看”

translation.en: [Tom] There were, like, six more,
translation.zh: 还有六个其他的口号

translation.en: and they were all like the very first time I sat down to write trash talk.
translation.zh: 这是我第一次坐下来写这种嘴炮话

translation.en: But it was really the culmination of 15 years of playing all the time.
translation.zh: 但其实这是我打球15年来的顶峰时刻

translation.en: [Tom] So when we started with AND1, we didn't know how merchandising worked,
translation.zh: 我们刚开始做AND1时 并不知道商业是怎么运作的

translation.en: how retail worked. We didn't know anything.
translation.zh: 零售业怎么运作 我们什么都不懂

translation.en: So we were creating our own culture, and sometimes that was a beautiful thing,
translation.zh: 于是我们创建了自己的文化 有时候这是件很美好的事情

translation.en: and sometimes it was Lord of the Flies.
translation.zh: 有时候这就像是《蝇王》

translation.en: Two Wharton degrees and a Stanford degree,
translation.zh: 两个沃顿商学院的 一个斯坦福的

translation.en: and we're selling T-shirts out of the back of a hatchback.
translation.zh: 我们却在车的后备箱里卖T恤

translation.en: The first year we lost money.
translation.zh: 第一年我们亏损了

translation.en: But I remember the feeling of someone saying,
translation.zh: 但我记得当有人跟你说

translation.en: "I wanna pay you for your shirts." I was like, "Wow."
translation.zh: “我想花钱买你的T恤”时的感受

translation.en: And people loved the trash-talking shirts.
translation.zh: 大家都喜欢这种嘴炮T恤

translation.en: So we felt like, you know, we might have something here.
translation.zh: 于是我们感觉自己可能有点东西

translation.en: And then we ended up getting an order for three or four styles from Foot Locker.
translation.zh: 然后我们收到了鞋品店 想买三四种款式的订购

translation.en: Holy cow. We just got a $13,000 order.
translation.zh: 老天爷 我们收到了13000美元的订单

translation.en: The other stores see kids walking around with our shirts, and they're calling us.
translation.zh: 其他店看到 那些孩子穿着我们的衣服逛街 然后打给我们

translation.en: For the first time, we're not calling people.
translation.zh: 这是我们头一次没有主动去找别人

translation.en: -[ringing] -People are calling us.
translation.zh: 而是别人主动找我们

translation.en: Okay. We got something here. Like, this is gonna go.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们有两下子 看样子能行

translation.en: Turning into some big business for a T-shirt company.
translation.zh: 变成了一家T恤公司的大生意

translation.en: This kind of fashion, not the kind of thing you see every day, but they're on to something.
translation.zh: 这类时尚不是那种日常风格 但它们很受欢迎

translation.en: Come on. We wanna do it, don't we?
translation.zh: 拜托 我们想做的 对吧？

translation.en: Well, I was looking forward to playing basketball,
translation.zh: 我本来很期待打篮球来着

translation.en: but I guess that's out the window.
translation.zh: 但看样子是没戏了

translation.en: You want some of me--
translation.zh: 你想让我准备…

translation.en: [Tom] Within that first year,
translation.zh: 在第一年里

translation.en: we ended up doing about 1.6 million in sales.
translation.zh: 我们最终销售了160万

translation.en: Then the challenge becomes, "Okay. What's next though?"
translation.zh: 之后的挑战就变成了 “好吧 那接下来怎么办？”

translation.en: We knew we wanted to be a billion-dollar company.
translation.zh: 我们清楚 我们想成为一家 价值数十亿美元的公司

translation.en: So from day one, we were competing with only one brand.
translation.zh: 从第一天起 我们就只是在和一个品牌竞争

translation.en: Just do it!
translation.zh: （耐克 只管去做）

translation.en: Nike was a company we emulated the most.
translation.zh: 耐克是我们的头号竞争对手

translation.en: And they associate themselves with great talent.
translation.zh: 他们把自己的品牌 与了不起的人才联系在一起

translation.en: Here we have the, uh, the new, improved Air Jordan.
translation.zh: 这是一双改善后的全新乔丹篮球鞋

translation.en: We want to make the number one basketball brand in the world.
translation.zh: 我们希望能成为头号篮球品牌

translation.en: We can't do that unless we do shoes.
translation.zh: 但如果不涉足鞋类 就不可能做到

translation.en: [Tom] That's where the money was at,
translation.zh: 这才是最大的卖点

translation.en: and Nike had that whole market on lockdown.
translation.zh: 而耐克占据了整个市场

translation.en: [reporter 1] High-tech shoes and slick ads get more and more sophisticated.
translation.zh: 高科技球鞋和花哨的广告 变得越来越精致复杂

translation.en: Nike is just doing it.
translation.zh: 耐克在放手去做

translation.en: [reporter 2] Fourth-quarter profits improves to 126 million dollars.
translation.zh: 第四季度的利润提高到1.26亿美元

translation.en: [man] When you bring the right athlete with the right advertising,
translation.zh: 在合适的广告里启用合适的运动员

translation.en: it creates a very strong situation in the marketplace.
translation.zh: 就能在市场上 打造出一个非常强大的局面

translation.en: So now, we need to go and get our own Michael Jordan.
translation.zh: 所以我们得去寻找 我们自己的迈克尔乔丹

translation.en: We couldn't start with B-level guys.
translation.zh: 我们不能从二线明星开始

translation.en: If we're gonna do this, we need to go get an A-level guy.
translation.zh: 如果要做 就得去找一线明星

translation.en: -[announcer] Marbury behind the back to… -[whistle blows]
translation.zh: 马布里

translation.en: There's no "ifs" for Stephon Marbury from Georgia Tech.
translation.zh: 对于乔治亚理工的斯蒂芬马布里来说 没有什么“假如”一说

translation.en: He says he's ready to move on and rub shoulders with Magic and Michael.
translation.zh: 他说他已经准备好继续前进 与魔术师及乔丹对战

translation.en: Everyone in basketball knew Steph. He was an electric basketball player.
translation.zh: 篮球界的人都知道斯蒂芬 他是个火爆的篮球运动员

translation.en: With the fourth pick in the 1996 NBA Draft,
translation.zh: 在1996年的NBA选秀中 密尔沃基雄鹿队

translation.en: the Milwaukee Bucks select Stephon Marbury from Georgia Tech University.
translation.zh: 在第一轮第四顺位中 选择了乔治亚理工的斯蒂芬马布里

translation.en: [reporter] This man is a can't miss.
translation.zh: 这家伙是个不可错过的人才

translation.en: [Seth] We effectively bet the company on Steph.
translation.zh: 我们把整个公司都押在了斯蒂芬身上

translation.en: We said, "We want you to be a ten-year endorsement deal,"
translation.zh: 我们说：“我们想和你 签十年赞助合约” 这种事闻所未闻

translation.en: which is unheard of for a kid who had never played a minute
translation.zh: 我们说：“我们想和你 签十年赞助合约” 这种事闻所未闻 一个从未打过职业联赛的小屁孩

translation.en: of professional basketball.
translation.zh: 一个从未打过职业联赛的小屁孩

translation.en: [announcer] From Georgia Tech, number 3, Stephon Marbury!
translation.zh: 来自乔治亚理工的三号队员 斯蒂芬马布里！

translation.en: [Jay] For opening night, myself and Seth are literally courtside,
translation.zh: 在首秀那晚 我和塞斯坐在球场边

translation.en: and we're so excited.
translation.zh: 我们超级兴奋

translation.en: The shoes are hitting the water, coming into Foot Locker.
translation.zh: 那些球鞋就要上市了 马上就要进入鞋品店了

translation.en: The TV ads are running.
translation.zh: 电视广告也开始播了

translation.en: Who knew that all we'd been building was gonna go up in smoke that night.
translation.zh: 谁能想到我们辛苦建设的一切 会在那一晚烟消云散

translation.en: I can still see it. Steph goes up, and I'm like, "uh-oh."
translation.zh: 我现在还没忘记那个画面 斯蒂芬跃起 然后我说：“糟了”

translation.en: [announcer] Oh my goodness.
translation.zh: 我的天呐

translation.en: I just broke out in a cold sweat seeing that.
translation.zh: 看到那一幕 我直出冷汗

translation.en: Our faces are white.
translation.zh: 我们的脸色变得惨白

translation.en: [Seth] Oh my God. We just ran a "breaking ankles" TV campaign for Stephon Marbury.
translation.zh: 我的天 我们刚刚为斯蒂芬马布里 做了一个“摔断脚”的电视广告

translation.en: And Stephon just broke his ankle wearing our shoes.
translation.zh: 斯蒂芬穿着我们的鞋摔断了脚踝

translation.en: A week before the shoes are supposed to hit.
translation.zh: 一周之后 这双鞋就要上市了

translation.en: [announcer] Stephon Marbury being helped off the floor…
translation.zh: 斯蒂芬马布里在搀扶下走下了球场

translation.en: [Stephon] I usually recover real quickly, but being that this is a bit more severe,
translation.zh: 通常情况下 我恢复得非常快 但这次受伤有些严重

translation.en: I'm really hurting, you know, knowing that I can't play.
translation.zh: 知道自己不能再打了 我很受伤

translation.en: [Jay] And so, we're in the tunnel,
translation.zh: 我们在通道里 我们看到斯蒂芬的经纪人

translation.en: and we see Steph's agent looking at us with just, like, daggers in his eyes.
translation.zh: 我们在通道里 我们看到斯蒂芬的经纪人 怒目圆睁地瞪着我们

translation.en: [Seth] Someone on his team says,
translation.zh: 他的团队里有人说：

translation.en: "I might have Stephon go on national TV and dump your shoes in the garbage can."
translation.zh: “不如让斯蒂芬上全国电台 把你们的鞋灌篮进垃圾箱”

translation.en: And I literally just said, "Bro, it's been real, but I think we're done."
translation.zh: 我说：“合作挺愉快 但我们结束了 我想不出任何不让我们破产的办法”

translation.en: "I can't figure out any way we're not gonna go broke right here."
translation.zh: 我想不出任何不让我们破产的办法”

translation.en: [Jay] We wanted to play the endorsement game, wanted to out-Nike Nike, and we failed.
translation.zh: 我们想找人代言 我们想比耐克更成功 但我们失败了

translation.en: Two weeks later, we got this tape. It had been around our office.
translation.zh: 两周后 我们收到了这个录像带 它一直在我们的办公室里

translation.en: There were a couple of interns, and they were always watching it.
translation.zh: 有两个实习生 他们一直在看

translation.en: [Jay] The video blew our minds.
translation.zh: 这个录像带让我们大为震撼

translation.en: [Seth] I was like, "Holy shit."
translation.zh: 我直惊呼：“我的天”

translation.en: I've seen a lot of basketball.
translation.zh: 我见过不少篮球比赛

translation.en: [chuckling] I've never seen this before.
translation.zh: 但从没见过这种

translation.en: [Tom] And in this game was 15-year-old Rafer Alston,
translation.zh: 这个比赛里有个15岁的孩子 拉夫阿尔斯通

translation.en: who was called "Skip 2 My Lou."
translation.zh: 他的别名叫“跳跃我的灵魂”

translation.en: [announcer] Show some love for my homeboy,
translation.zh: 给我的老乡展现一些热情

translation.en: Skip 2 My Lou!
translation.zh: 跳跃我的灵魂！ （跳跃我的灵魂 拉夫阿尔斯通）

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] New York streetball style, it's a style where you just let your imagination flow.
translation.zh: 纽约街头篮球的风格 是随你尽情发挥想象力

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] It was more poetry in motion.
translation.zh: 它更像是运动的诗歌

translation.en: It was more trickery and sorcery.
translation.zh: 充满了诡计和魔术

translation.en: I always wanted to deceive you.
translation.zh: 我总会想要骗过你

translation.en: A third of what he's doing is illegal right here.
translation.zh: 他的招数中 有三分之一都是不合规矩的

translation.en: But I don't really think it matters because it's so unique.
translation.zh: 但我觉得这并不重要 因为实在是太独特了

translation.en: Streetball is hip-hop,
translation.zh: 街头篮球是嘻哈

translation.en: graffiti, breakdancing,
translation.zh: 涂鸦、霹雳舞

translation.en: all-in-one.
translation.zh: 合为一体的产物

translation.en: And the crowd is our music.
translation.zh: 观众就是我们的音乐

translation.en: Winning has nothing to do with streetball.
translation.zh: 街头篮球无关输赢

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] Your team, they could lose, but if you've electrified the crowd,
translation.zh: 你的队伍输了也罢 但如果你能让观众沸腾起来

translation.en: they were satisfied. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 他们就足够满意

translation.en: [The Main Event] The court is the canvas.
translation.zh: 球场就像一张画布

translation.en: The style of play that you have is your ink.
translation.zh: 你的打球风格就是你的粉墨

translation.en: And the player that you is is the artist.
translation.zh: 作为球员的你就是艺术家

translation.en: A lot of us come up through the inner city in single-parent homes.
translation.zh: 我们很多人都来自贫民区的单亲家庭

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] My mom had me when she was 15.
translation.zh: 我妈妈生我的时候才15岁

translation.en: I grew up in one of the biggest projects in the Bronx.
translation.zh: 我在布朗克斯最大的公房之一长大

translation.en: I never really had a steady home to practice my skills.
translation.zh: 我从来没有一个稳定的家 以让我练习自己的技能

translation.en: It wasn't about sports, it was about survival.
translation.zh: 这和体育无关 这只是生存

translation.en: The first time I touched a basketball, I probably was maybe 11, 12?
translation.zh: 我第一次接触篮球的时候 大概是11岁、12岁吧？

translation.en: Just didn't really have the basketball skills or basketball IQ.
translation.zh: 我就是没有篮球技能或者篮球智商

translation.en: But my dad would take me out to different parks,
translation.zh: 但我爸爸会带我去不同的公园球场

translation.en: and that's where I honed a lot of my skills.
translation.zh: 我在那里磨练自己的技能

translation.en: Streetball, it's a way of life here.
translation.zh: 街头篮球是这里的一种生活方式

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] It wasn't about money. Because that was the NBA.
translation.zh: 和金钱无关 因为NBA才和钱有关

translation.en: [announcer] Swish picks up Dumars, who lets it fly, and he hits it again for three!
translation.zh: 斯威什接住了杜马斯 他投球 又一次得到了三分！

translation.en: [The Main Event] Where we came from,
translation.zh: 我们这种家境的人

translation.en: a lot of people don't have that type of money
translation.zh: 大部分都没有闲钱

translation.en: to go see an NBA game at the Madison Square Garden.
translation.zh: 去麦迪逊广场花园看一场NBA比赛

translation.en: So for us, Rucker was the main stage in New York City.
translation.zh: 所以对我们来说 洛克公园才是纽约的主要舞台

translation.en: Streetball was born there.
translation.zh: 街头篮球是在那里诞生的

translation.en: When they first took me to watch a game, I was little and skinny.
translation.zh: 我第一次看比赛的时候 还是个瘦小的孩子

translation.en: I made my way to the front, and I just sat right there on the court.
translation.zh: 我钻到最前排 就站在球场边上

translation.en: I'm watching my idols play.
translation.zh: 看着自己的偶像们打球

translation.en: Pee Wee Kirkland, Joe Hammond, Earl Manigault,
translation.zh: 小便柯克兰、乔哈蒙德 厄尔麦尼考尔特

translation.en: Dr. J.
translation.zh: J博士

translation.en: People that were seven, eight blocks away, you could hear them.
translation.zh: 住在七八个街区以外的人 你都能听到他们的声音

translation.en: You knew where everyone was at.
translation.zh: 你知道所有人都在看

translation.en: Most people at some point realized,
translation.zh: 大部分人在某一时刻意识到

translation.en: "I might not make D1. I might not make the NBA."
translation.zh: “我可能进不了D1锦标赛 也进不了NBA”

translation.en: But you can still go play at the playground.
translation.zh: 但你依然可以在球场上打球

translation.en: So I realized what's on this tape.
translation.zh: 于是我明白了这个录像带的意义

translation.en: It's just pure, like, self-expression.
translation.zh: 这是一种纯粹的自我表达

translation.en: And that's when I started to understand this is the essence of who we are.
translation.zh: 这时候 我开始明白 这才是我们的本质

translation.en: We're playground.
translation.zh: 我们就是球场

translation.en: We're grassroots. We're everyman basketball.
translation.zh: 我们是草根 我们是平民篮球

translation.en: We're attitude, we're raw expression, we're art.
translation.zh: 我们代表了一种态度和原始表达 我们就是艺术

translation.en: And this is a strategic position that Nike can't touch.
translation.zh: 这种战略定位是耐克无法比及的

translation.en: [reporter] We interrupt this program to bring you the following Special Report.
translation.zh: 我们打断这个节目 是为了给大家播放特别报道

translation.en: [anchor] Good morning and thank you for joining us.
translation.zh: 大家早上好 感谢收看

translation.en: It's the day Bulls fans around the world have been dreading for years.
translation.zh: 今天是全世界的公牛队粉丝 恐惧了多年的日子

translation.en: Michael Jordan is scheduled to make a big announcement
translation.zh: 迈克尔乔丹准备在联合中心

translation.en: at the United Center any minute now.
translation.zh: 很快宣布一个重大消息

translation.en: I am here to… to announce my retirement from the game of basketball.
translation.zh: 我来这里 是想宣布自己从篮球比赛中退役

translation.en: [Jay] Now, all of a sudden, with Jordan being out
translation.zh: （时代终结） 忽然间 乔丹退役

translation.en: and there being no games on because of the NBA lockout,
translation.zh: 还有NBA停摆事件 所有比赛都停了

translation.en: there was a void in the basketball market.
translation.zh: 篮球市场出现了一个巨大的空白

translation.en: There was this opportunity for new content that didn't exist before.
translation.zh: 以前未曾存在的新内容 终于有机会出现了

translation.en: [Jay] As a business,
translation.zh: 作为一家企业 我们如何将

translation.en: how can we take that experience of a streetball game at the Rucker
translation.zh: 作为一家企业 我们如何将 洛克公园的街头比赛体验

translation.en: and make it something that actually fills that void?
translation.zh: 转化成填补这个空白的东西呢？

translation.en: One of the young guys that we had hired to do product placement in New York,
translation.zh: 我们在纽约 雇了一个年轻人做植入式广告

translation.en: a guy named Set Free, who was a DJ, producer, hip-hop artist.
translation.zh: 他叫“释放自由” 是个DJ、制片人、嘻哈艺术家

translation.en: He says, "We should make that a mixtape and just give it away."
translation.zh: 他说：“我们应该做个录像合辑 然后免费发放出去”

translation.en: It ended up being this collection of footage plus unreleased music.
translation.zh: （跳跃我的灵魂 94年） 最终我们制作了一系列视频合辑 加上未发行的音乐

translation.en: This is Sway from the World Famous Wake Up Show,
translation.zh: 我是世界知名节目 《醒醒》的主持人斯威

translation.en: and y'all are about to view the AND1 Mixtape on video.
translation.zh: 你们即将收看 《AND1 录像合辑》的视频

translation.en: Coming to you live. Keep it banging!
translation.zh: 直播呈现给你 保持酷炫吧！

translation.en: AND1 pressed 50,000 old-school VHS tapes.
translation.zh: AND1压制了五万个老式家庭录像带

translation.en: We gave away through the street teams, clubs, courts, neighborhood barbershops.
translation.zh: 我们通过街头球队、俱乐部 球场、社区理发店免费发送

translation.en: And it was like the new crack. It went rampant in the inner city.
translation.zh: 感觉就像是新的毒品 在贫民区里肆意泛滥

translation.en: [Tom] Each person sharing it with another dozen or two dozen or three dozen people.
translation.zh: 每个人都会传播给其他十几个人 或者二十几个、三十几个人

translation.en: We had this insane viral marketing in the pre-internet age. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 在前互联网时代 我们就开展了这场疯狂的病毒式营销

translation.en: After Mixtape came out, I was like a hero in New York City.
translation.zh: 《录像合辑》发行后 我变成了纽约城的英雄

translation.en: Before I know it, I have 20 people walking behind me.
translation.zh: 还没趁我反应过来 粉丝就开始追在我身后了

translation.en: "Oh man, Skip. I wanna walk with you. Can I walk inside the park with you?"
translation.zh: “跳跃 我想跟着你走 我能在公园里跟着你走吗？”

translation.en: [Sway] Look out for Volume 2, y'all! AND1 Mixtape!
translation.zh: 为第二卷做好准备吧 大家！ 《AND1 录像合辑》

translation.en: By Monday, we had calls coming in from people who had lost their minds.
translation.zh: 周一的时候 所有失去理智的人 开始给我们打电话

translation.en: We all gathered around the phone, just listening to all these messages.
translation.zh: 我们围坐在电话旁 听着所有语音信息

translation.en: -[beeps] -[man] Yo, that mixtape was sick.
translation.zh: 哟 那个录像合辑太牛了

translation.en: [man 2] Killed it, AND1!
translation.zh: 厉害啊 AND1！

translation.en: [man 3] Skip 2 My Lou!
translation.zh: 跳跃我的灵魂！

translation.en: [man 4] Hold on.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: [man 5] Need another one, please!
translation.zh: 拜托再发行一卷吧！

translation.en: -[man 6] Where is Volume 2? -[beeps]
translation.zh: 第二卷在哪里？

translation.en: Immediately the question was, "How do we do another one?"
translation.zh: 现在的问题是 我们如何再做一卷？

translation.en: So we created the idea for the AND1 Mixtape Tour.
translation.zh: 于是我们创造出 “AND1录像合辑巡回比赛”这个想法

translation.en: We're gonna put together the best playground pickup basketball team we can.
translation.zh: 我们要选出一支最出色的街头篮球队

translation.en: Get your best five, and we have our best five
translation.zh: 你们选出最佳五人队 和我们的最佳五人队

translation.en: and let's put on a game.
translation.zh: 我们来比试一场

translation.en: But let's not just do it one time in New York.
translation.zh: 但不仅仅是在纽约赛一场

translation.en: Let's start going city to city.
translation.zh: 我们开始去其他城市巡游

translation.en: [man] I was brought on at AND1 as a tour manager and headed up Player Relations.
translation.zh: 我被AND1聘为巡回比赛经理 并负责球员关系

translation.en: The idea was, "Hey. We're just gonna do this five-city tour."
translation.zh: 我们的想法就是 “做一个五座城市巡回比赛”

translation.en: Really to get content for more mixtapes.
translation.zh: 其实就是为了 给更多的录像合辑收集资料

translation.en: [announcer] Shane!
translation.zh: 沙恩！

translation.en: [The Main Event] I just got kicked out of Rutgers University 'cause of my grades.
translation.zh: 我因为成绩太差被罗格斯大学开除了

translation.en: Now I'm back at home. My son was four or five. You know, I needed a job.
translation.zh: 现在回到家 我儿子四、五岁了 你懂的 我需要一份工作

translation.en: [The Main Event] I get a call from AND1.
translation.zh: 我接到AND1打的电话

translation.en: "Yo, you think you'll pull a game off in your hometown?"
translation.zh: “哟 我们能在你的家乡 组织一场比赛吗？”

translation.en: First phone call I made was Shane.
translation.zh: 我第一个打给的人是沙恩

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Playing streetball, but it's in my thirties,
translation.zh: 玩街头篮球 但我已经30多岁了

translation.en: and the NBA was far-fetched for me.
translation.zh: NBA对我来说遥不可及

translation.en: I'll never forget.
translation.zh: 我永远忘不了

translation.en: I'm standing on the corner, and Main calls me.
translation.zh: 我站在街角 大人物打电话给我

translation.en: And it was going through one end out the other end.
translation.zh: 我左耳朵听 右耳朵出

translation.en: The only thing that really caught my attention was,
translation.zh: 唯一引起我注意的话是

translation.en: "AND1's gonna give us free sneakers,
translation.zh: “AND1要给我们免费球鞋

translation.en: free shorts to bust some dude's ass? Let's do it."
translation.zh: 免费球裤 让我们给别人点厉害看看 没问题啊”

translation.en: [Duke] Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls. My name is Duke Tango.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们 女孩们男孩们 欢迎大家 我是杜克探戈

translation.en: And sit back and relax because this is how we roll.
translation.zh: 坐好放松 因为这就是我们的风格

translation.en: Duke Tango's the godfather announcer of streetball.
translation.zh: 杜克探戈是街头篮球的教父级主持人

translation.en: If Duke Tango gave you your name,
translation.zh: 如果杜克探戈宣布了你的名字

translation.en: he's solidifying who you are as that streetballer.
translation.zh: 那么你的街头篮球玩家地位就稳固了

translation.en: Main said, "Yo, would you like to be involved with this?"
translation.zh: 大人物说：“你想参与吗？”

translation.en: And I looked at him like, "Who would say no to that?"
translation.zh: 我看着他说：“谁会拒绝呢？”

translation.en: When you see that crowd around the corner,
translation.zh: 你看到街角那些人群

translation.en: and then you walk into that park and see thousands of people?
translation.zh: 然后你走进那个公园 看到上千名观众？

translation.en: Ain't no way in the world you can be prepared for that.
translation.zh: 你不可能做好准备的

translation.en: Well, I say, "Yo, Main and Shane,
translation.zh: 我说：“大人物和沙恩

translation.en: let's go to Philadelphia and get AO."
translation.zh: 我们去费城 把AO找来”

translation.en: "Let's get this Headache."
translation.zh: “我们去把头痛找来”

translation.en: Then I got Black Widow,
translation.zh: 然后我找来了黑寡妇

translation.en: and Half Man Half Amazing.
translation.zh: 半人半神

translation.en: And so, AND1 did the first-ever contracts with streetball players.
translation.zh: 于是AND1与街头篮球队员们 签订了前所未有的第一份合同

translation.en: [Tom] The first stop is Linden, New Jersey.
translation.zh: 第一站是新泽西的林登

translation.en: We brought the camera crew to film both crowd and game.
translation.zh: 我们带着摄影团队 拍摄观众和比赛

translation.en: I don't even think I really knew what filmmaking was back then.
translation.zh: 那时候 我对电影拍摄并不了解

translation.en: I just knew I had a camera in my hand,
translation.zh: 我只知道自己的手里有个摄像机

translation.en: and I'm bringing the audience with me.
translation.zh: 我要把观众拍进去

translation.en: I just tried to capture everything
translation.zh: 我想把自己感受到的一切

translation.en: that I felt and everything that I saw because it was unbelievable.
translation.zh: 自己看到的一切都录下来 因为太难以置信了

translation.en: [The Main Event] This is Chris Hightower's itinerary.
translation.zh: 这是克里斯海涛尔的日程表

translation.en: -[Gee Lock] This is a Hightower original? -Official.
translation.zh: -这是海涛尔的原件？ -官方原件

translation.en: [Chris] When I went on tour. they gave me a corporate car,
translation.zh: 巡回比赛时 他们给了我一辆公司的车

translation.en: six grand in cash, and was like, "Make it work."
translation.zh: 还有六千美金 然后说：“要成功”

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] We stayed in shit hotels. We shared rooms.
translation.zh: 我们住在破烂的宾馆 挤在一个房间

translation.en: We're playing in front of a crowd of 100 people.
translation.zh: 我们在一百名观众面前比赛

translation.en: And now I'm in a minivan
translation.zh: 现在我坐在小面包车里

translation.en: sitting in the chair from the house that's sliding all over in the van.
translation.zh: 坐在一把从房间里拿来的椅子上 椅子在车里滑来滑去

translation.en: [Chris] We were our own street team.
translation.zh: 我们就是自己的街头团队

translation.en: Boxes of tapes,
translation.zh: 整箱的录像带

translation.en: we're passing them out, passing out flyers,
translation.zh: 我们免费分发出去 还有传单

translation.en: trying to do every and anything we could to get people to the event.
translation.zh: 尽全力去做一切 让别人来观看这些比赛

translation.en: We didn't know where it was gonna go. There was no blueprint.
translation.zh: 我们那时没有蓝图 不知道会变成什么样

translation.en: And it was really just all about having a platform
translation.zh: 对我们这种没能晋级NBA的球员来说

translation.en: for players like ourselves, who didn't make it to the NBA,
translation.zh: 做这件事的重点就是拥有一个平台

translation.en: to get paid to play.
translation.zh: 能够打球挣钱 （华盛顿DC）

translation.en: [Jay] So every year we go to one of those big trade shows.
translation.zh: 每年我们都会参加一个大型的贸易展

translation.en: We're running these videos outside of our booth.
translation.zh: 我们会在展位外播放这些录像

translation.en: There's a massive crowd, and they're coming to watch Volume 2.
translation.zh: 有一大群人围过来 要看第二卷

translation.en: We knew at that moment that there was something here
translation.zh: 那一刻我们明白了 这一切的规模

translation.en: that could be much bigger than we thought, much faster than we thought.
translation.zh: 要比我们想像中大得多 比我们想象中发展的快得多

translation.en: Hot 97.5 ATL's original hip-hop and R&B station,
translation.zh: 亚特兰大97.5频道 嘻哈与节奏布鲁斯电台

translation.en: I got the AND1 all-stars. I mean, y'all seen the mixtape.
translation.zh: 我带来了AND1全明星阵容 你们都见识过了录像合辑

translation.en: You seen them balling out of control.
translation.zh: 你们见识到了他们打球

translation.en: They gonna be doing their thing today. Go check them out.
translation.zh: 他们今天会大秀一场 所以敬请关注

translation.en: [man] It's going down from 4:30 to 6:00.
translation.zh: 比赛将在4点30分到6点之间

translation.en: If you wanna become the next streetball player,
translation.zh: 如果你想成为下一个街头篮球成员

translation.en: come on down, this is your opportunity.
translation.zh: 那就过来吧 这是你的机会

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] When we played in Atlanta, that atmosphere was totally different.
translation.zh: 我们在亚特兰大比赛的时候 那里的气氛完全不同

translation.en: [crowd] Hot Sauce! Hot Sauce!
translation.zh: 辣酱！

translation.en: I can hear the crowd. The crowd is saying, "Hot Sauce."
translation.zh: 我听到观众高呼“辣酱”

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Yo, like, who is Hot Sauce?
translation.zh: 哟 辣酱是谁？

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] I used to play in the hoods in Georgia,
translation.zh: 我曾经在乔治亚州的街头打球

translation.en: stealing balls out of other people's yards.
translation.zh: 从别人家的后院里偷球打

translation.en: I had a job, but I never could keep a job.
translation.zh: 我有过工作 但总是保不住

translation.en: My nine-to-five was just working on my handles.
translation.zh: 我在朝九晚五的工作中只会练习球技

translation.en: I was already a local legend.
translation.zh: 我已经在本地很有名气了

translation.en: Every day I played, people just circled around the court.
translation.zh: 每天打球的时候 大家都会围住球场

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] After seeing Mixtape 1 and Mixtape 2,
translation.zh: 看过《录像合辑1》 和《录像合辑2》后

translation.en: I was hungry to be on the tapes.
translation.zh: 我也很渴望上这些录像

translation.en: But I didn't know what… what it would take.
translation.zh: 但不知道该怎么做

translation.en: That's when I heard that they decided to take the tour to Atlanta.
translation.zh: 然后我听说 他们决定去亚特兰大巡回比赛

translation.en: That's when my opportunity came.
translation.zh: 那时候 我的机会来了

translation.en: I was in jail, you know, doing some of this knucklehead teenage stuff.
translation.zh: 我那时因为干了些青少年的蠢事 被关进了监狱

translation.en: But the day I got out of jail, the next day was a tour game.
translation.zh: 但在我出狱的第二天 他们就举办了比赛

translation.en: It was like, "Yo. What is this?"
translation.zh: 当时的感觉就是 “哟 这是什么？”

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] A lot of us are like, "What is he doing?"
translation.zh: 我们很多人在想：“他在干什么？”

translation.en: It was… It was amazing.
translation.zh: 太惊人了

translation.en: When Hot Sauce did that…
translation.zh: 辣酱使出那招时

translation.en: Oh baby!
translation.zh: 宝贝啊！

translation.en: That was it.
translation.zh: 太牛了

translation.en: One man took the idea of streetball, and he just flipped it.
translation.zh: 那家伙完全颠覆了街头篮球的概念

translation.en: The flair and his image,
translation.zh: 他的才华和形象

translation.en: it forever changed the game.
translation.zh: 永远改变了游戏

translation.en: [Jay] Volume 3 became "The Hot Sauce" tape.
translation.zh: 《第三卷》变成了辣酱的合辑

translation.en: We got the new star. It's done. This is all about this kid Hot Sauce.
translation.zh: 我们收获了一个新明星 这个叫辣酱的孩子得到了全部关注

translation.en: So we signed him.
translation.zh: 于是我们签了他

translation.en: [Gee Lock] From the first game on,
translation.zh: 从第一场比赛开始

translation.en: he was like an icon.
translation.zh: 他就成为了偶像

translation.en: [Gee Lock] Once he came on the tour,
translation.zh: 等他加入巡回比赛时

translation.en: it was a whole nother animal.
translation.zh: 一切都变得不一样了

translation.en: [chuckling] You know what I'm saying? Like, no more minivans.
translation.zh: 你懂吗？我们不再坐小面包车了

translation.en: It was three-million-dollar tour buses decked out.
translation.zh: 而是价值百万的巡回大巴 豪华装修的那种

translation.en: -Hot Sauce! -Hot Sauce!
translation.zh: -辣酱！ -辣酱！

translation.en: Look, it's the Sauce world now. It's my show.
translation.zh: 现在成了辣酱的世界 是我表演的时间

translation.en: My favorite is Hot Sauce.
translation.zh: 我最爱的就是辣酱

translation.en: Hot Sauce is number one.
translation.zh: 辣酱是老大

translation.en: I like Hot Sauce. He my boy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢辣酱 他是我的最爱

translation.en: Hot Sauce was the guy that everyone wanted to see.
translation.zh: 辣酱是所有人都想观摩的明星

translation.en: Not just the inner-city youth,
translation.zh: 不仅仅是贫民区的小孩

translation.en: but even the kids in the suburbs watching his tape.
translation.zh: 甚至生活在郊区的中产孩子们 也会看他的录像带

translation.en: -He's crazy! -[man 1] I know.
translation.zh: -他太牛了！ -是啊

translation.en: [man 2] Oh my God!
translation.zh: 我的天！

translation.en: They were studying his moves.
translation.zh: 他们会学习他的招数

translation.en: -[The Dribbling Machine] Y2K. -[The Main Event] Y2K.
translation.zh: -Y2K -Y2K

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] The Flintstone.
translation.zh: 摩登原始人

translation.en: The Boomerang.
translation.zh: 回旋镖

translation.en: Then you see people on the court trying to figure out,
translation.zh: 球场上的人都在思考

translation.en: "How did he do that?" And then doing it themselves.
translation.zh: “他是怎么做到的？” 然后自己试着去模仿

translation.en: [man] I was the kid that would watch the Mixtapes over and over and over.
translation.zh: 我会一遍又一遍地看《录像合辑》

translation.en: I could do a move, but it wouldn't quite be like Hot Sauce, you know?
translation.zh: 我可以模仿一些动作 但做不到辣酱那种水平 你懂吗？

translation.en: The way he handled the basketball was so unique and innovative.
translation.zh: 他打球的招数实在很独特、新颖

translation.en: This guy, like, moves the crowd.
translation.zh: 那家伙会打动观众

translation.en: I wanted to captivate the crowd like Hot Sauce.
translation.zh: 我想和辣酱一样 俘虏观众的心

translation.en: At that time, I might've been the most popular basketball player on Earth.
translation.zh: 那段时间 我可能是 全世界最受欢迎的篮球运动员

translation.en: We got the AND1 streetballers.
translation.zh: 我们有请AND1街头篮球玩家

translation.en: They're gonna strut their stuff out on the stage.
translation.zh: 现在他们要在舞台上大显身手一番

translation.en: Let's start it out with Hot Sauce.
translation.zh: 我们首先有请辣酱

translation.en: -You got a movie coming out in September. -That was a great experience, right there.
translation.zh: -九月份会有一部你的电影发布 -那是个很棒的经历

translation.en: As a business, we hadn't really tied the Mixtape to sales.
translation.zh: 从企业角度讲 我们没有把《合辑》与销售联系起来

translation.en: But when we did Volume 3, The Rise of Hot Sauce,
translation.zh: 但当我们拍第三卷《辣酱的崛起》时

translation.en: we partnered with Footaction.
translation.zh: 我们与Footaction开始合作

translation.en: The idea was you have to buy any AND1 product,
translation.zh: 我们的策略就是 只要你买任何AND1的产品

translation.en: and we're gonna give away a free Mixtape.
translation.zh: 我们就赠送一个免费的《录像合辑》

translation.en: We have kids from the street. They have a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 有不少街头的孩子来 他们玩得很开心

translation.en: And every… every, uh, consumer that we talk to connects with them.
translation.zh: （首席执行官） 我们和每一位消费者聊天 与他们建立关系

translation.en: I'm at some store buying some things, and I'm like, "Yo, that's me right there."
translation.zh: 我去某个商店买东西 然后心想： “哟 那张照片是我啊”

translation.en: Everywhere I go, I see our faces with our names.
translation.zh: 无论去哪儿 都能看到我们的脸和名字

translation.en: [man] AND1 is hot right now. Really hot.
translation.zh: AND1现在极其抢手 很抢手

translation.en: These last two weeks, sales have really been bumping.
translation.zh: 过去两周里 销售量一直在上涨

translation.en: And that was the first time I remember Nike paying attention.
translation.zh: 我记得 那是我们第一次引起了耐克的注意

translation.en: We got, like, three people, and we're taking on Goliath.
translation.zh: 我们只有三个人 却在对抗商业巨头

translation.en: And when we started to out-compete,
translation.zh: 当我们开始在竞争中胜出时

translation.en: we knew we were gonna be a legitimate threat.
translation.zh: 我们知道 我们会成为实实在在的威胁

translation.en: [Seth] I'll never forget.
translation.zh: 我绝对忘记不了

translation.en: Someone sent me a video from Nike's sales meeting.
translation.zh: 有人给我发来一段 耐克销售会议的视频

translation.en: They had a picture of AND1 in the crosshairs.
translation.zh: 他们摆了一张瞄准AND1的照片

translation.en: So it was like, "Got it. Nike took dead aim at us."
translation.zh: 所以我想：“明白了 耐克将矛头瞄准了我们”

translation.en: We were just consistent a top-two performing brand.
translation.zh: 我们是表现一直最出色的两个品牌

translation.en: And we had the mixtape tour. They didn't have anything like that.
translation.zh: 我们有录像合辑巡回比赛 他们没有这类活动

translation.en: That's like the heart of the game, and we owned the heart of the game.
translation.zh: 这是比赛的核心 我们拥有比赛的核心

translation.en: If you're Nike, you're risk-averse.
translation.zh: 如果你是耐克 你会规避风险

translation.en: They don't wanna offend a 50-year-old guy in middle America,
translation.zh: 他们不想冒犯 美国中部的某个50岁的男人

translation.en: and they sell to a broad audience. That's not who we are.
translation.zh: 他们的市场目标群很广 但我们不是这样的

translation.en: We're selling to core people who are basketball players and know it.
translation.zh: 我们只向篮球运动的核心群体 和了解篮球的人销售

translation.en: We knew that Nike felt they had to respond.
translation.zh: 我们知道耐克感觉他们必须做出回应

translation.en: And we had no idea what they were gonna do.
translation.zh: 我们完全不知道他们会怎样做

translation.en: We got it. Let's roll sound.
translation.zh: 我们搞定了 播放声音吧

translation.en: [woman] Camera speeds.
translation.zh: 开始摄像

translation.en: We are at the ESPN building in the "N-1" Mixtape Tour.
translation.zh: 我们在“N1”录像合辑巡回比赛中 来到了ESPN电台

translation.en: You know what that means? They don't know us.
translation.zh: 知道这代表什么吗？他们不了解我们

translation.en: In 2003, ESPN came to us
translation.zh: 2003年 ESPN电台来找到我们

translation.en: and said they wanted to do a TV show based around the tour.
translation.zh: 说他们想做一个 有关巡回比赛的电视节目

translation.en: Kind of like when reality TV was growing up.
translation.zh: 有点像是真人秀的初期作品

translation.en: [Chris] The basis of the ESPN show was to find that next guy.
translation.zh: ESPN节目的基础是想找到下一个明星

translation.en: Who's that next level of talent?
translation.zh: 谁拥有更高级别的才华？

translation.en: [Tom] It's basically like Survivor.
translation.zh: 感觉就像是《幸存者》

translation.en: We'll go to Portland, Atlanta, Seattle.
translation.zh: 我们将前往波特兰、 亚特兰大、西雅图

translation.en: And the winner, the survivor, the ultimate pick,
translation.zh: 而胜者、幸存者 那个最终被选中的人

translation.en: is someone who gets an AND1 contract.
translation.zh: 会获得AND1的合约

translation.en: Well, another unique event is returning to the capital city.
translation.zh: 又一个独特的活动回归首都

translation.en: The AND1 Mixtape Tour team is a collection of basketball characters
translation.zh: AND1录像合辑巡回比赛队伍 是一群有绰号、玩嘻哈的

translation.en: with nicknames and hip-hop playing hoops.
translation.zh: 篮球玩家之队

translation.en: If you think you can run with these guys, show up tomorrow from 4:00 to 6:30.
translation.zh: 如果你认为你能和这些人媲美 那就在明天4点到6点30分之间现身

translation.en: They're looking for a few extra players to play.
translation.zh: 他们在寻找球员加入

translation.en: [Chris] We were always looking for new talent, but no one stood out.
translation.zh: 我们一直在寻找新的人才 但没有人能脱颖而出

translation.en: There wasn't much streetball where I'm from in Keizer, Oregon.
translation.zh: 在我的家乡 俄勒冈州的凯泽 玩街球的并不多

translation.en: It was looked down upon.
translation.zh: 人们看不起这种运动

translation.en: Coaches, they didn't really respect that style of play.
translation.zh: 教练们并不太尊重这种玩法

translation.en: [Grayson] Growing up, I wasn't really as into the NBA.
translation.zh: 成长过程中 我并不是很喜欢NBA

translation.en: I liked watching AND1.
translation.zh: 我更喜欢看AND1

translation.en: And then I got to high school. I was really small.
translation.zh: 然后我上了高中 我的个头很小

translation.en: I kept getting cut from teams.
translation.zh: 我总是被队伍开除

translation.en: I had no college offers.
translation.zh: 我也没收到大学的录取通知

translation.en: That was one of the biggest heartbreaks.
translation.zh: 那是最让我伤心的事情之一

translation.en: It wasn't a girlfriend or anything like that.
translation.zh: 而不是女朋友之类的事情

translation.en: And I just decided to do something innovative
translation.zh: 我决定做一些创新的事情

translation.en: away from conventional basketball. Away from the NBA.
translation.zh: 远离传统篮球 远离NBA

translation.en: Slam Magazine released the routing of the tour.
translation.zh: 《扣篮》杂志 公布了这次巡回比赛的路线

translation.en: I saw that Portland was on there.
translation.zh: 我看到波特兰就在上面

translation.en: So I put all that energy into training,
translation.zh: 于是我用尽力气训练

translation.en: and I knew that this was my shot.
translation.zh: 我知道我的机会来了

translation.en: [Grayson] When I first got up there to open run tryouts,
translation.zh: 第一次到那里参加公开选拔赛时

translation.en: I had never seen people all around the court.
translation.zh: 我从未见过球场周围有这么多人

translation.en: Kids and people standing on the fences to get a better view.
translation.zh: 小孩和大人们站在栅栏上 只为了能看得更清楚

translation.en: Might be nerve-wracking with the tryout.
translation.zh: 选拔赛让人有些紧张

translation.en: [man] We gotta pick three people.
translation.zh: 我们要选出三个人

translation.en: We have to pick three people
translation.zh: 我们要选出三个人

translation.en: to make it to play inside the arena!
translation.zh: 这三个人最终能进入体育场！

translation.en: When my shot came up, I wasn't even thinking about passing.
translation.zh: 机会出现时 我根本没想着要传球

translation.en: [announcer] Okay. Let me see them feet.
translation.zh: 好嘞 让我瞧瞧这双脚

translation.en: [Grayson] A lot of moves I pulled off, people were like losing their minds.
translation.zh: 我做的许多动作让观众变得疯狂起来

translation.en: Right here, my man in the blue.
translation.zh: 那边那个穿蓝衣服的小孩

translation.en: I'm just excited to play with Hot Sauce. All these dudes I've seen on tape.
translation.zh: 能和辣酱打球 我很兴奋 我在录像带上看过他们打球

translation.en: I see them in real life, it's almost like… it's just like a dream, you know?
translation.zh: 能在现实生活中看到他们 简直像做梦一样 你懂吗？

translation.en: Stepping inside the arena was so awesome.
translation.zh: 走进体育场的感觉真是太棒了

translation.en: And I'm like, "Man, we're here." Like… [chuckling] "We made it!"
translation.zh: 我心想：“哇 我们来了 我们成功了！”

translation.en: So that first game playing against my idols was very surreal.
translation.zh: 所以第一场比赛 和我的偶像们一起打球 感觉太不真实了

translation.en: Crowd went crazy over a few moves. They respected that I didn't back down.
translation.zh: 我的一些动作让观众痴狂 我没有退缩 他们很尊重这一点

translation.en: [The Main Event] I made the overall pick.
translation.zh: 我做出了最终选择

translation.en: Gotta go with you.
translation.zh: 我们决定选择你

translation.en: [Grayson] So they asked me to come on tour with them
translation.zh: 他们让我一起参加巡回比赛

translation.en: as a contestant in this nationwide contest.
translation.zh: 以全国大赛的选手身份

translation.en: It kind of blew me away.
translation.zh: 我简直太震惊了

translation.en: I'm thinking my parents wouldn't let me, but they were like, "Go ahead and do it."
translation.zh: 我以为我父母不会同意 但他们却说：“尽管去吧”

translation.en: Going into the tour,
translation.zh: 进入巡回比赛后

translation.en: I knew that with every city, I definitely had a chance to go home.
translation.zh: 我知道 在每一个城市 我都有可能会被开除回家

translation.en: Because at every open run, a new player could knock somebody out.
translation.zh: 因为每一个公开选拔赛中 新选出来的球员会顶替一个人

translation.en: So somebody was always coming, and somebody was always going.
translation.zh: 总会有新人来 总会有旧人离开

translation.en: [Headache] He's the first one, and the first one's always the hardest
translation.zh: 他是第一个被选出来的 第一个人总是最难的

translation.en: 'cause we got 29 more cities.
translation.zh: 因为我们还要去29个城市

translation.en: -Yeah. I'm at a disadvantage, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -是啊 我处于劣势 对吧？ -是啊

translation.en: For me, coming in there at 18, I actually felt like a kid amongst adults.
translation.zh: 对我来说 18岁就进入队里 我感觉自己像成年人中的孩子

translation.en: Sometimes you have, like, 14, 15 people on the bench,
translation.zh: 有时候 替补板凳上有十四、五个人

translation.en: and you just try to make the best with the time you got.
translation.zh: 你只能在仅有的时间里做到最好

translation.en: [Duke] I said, "Yo, you know what? A white boy on this team?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你猜怎么着？ 队里居然有个白人小孩？

translation.en: "That's gonna be my godson. I'mma adopt him."
translation.zh: 我要收他为干儿子 我要收养他”

translation.en: I gave him his name as soon as I seen him.
translation.zh: 我看到他后 立刻给了他一个绰号

translation.en: That's my boy, my godson,
translation.zh: 感谢老天 我的干儿子

translation.en: the Rocky Balboa of basketball,
translation.zh: 篮球界的拳王洛奇

translation.en: The Professor!
translation.zh: 教授！

translation.en: Anything a talented white boy could do in the hood
translation.zh: （教授 格雷森鲍彻） 一个有才华的白人男孩 能在社区里做的事情

translation.en: is amplified a million times.
translation.zh: 总会被夸大一百万倍

translation.en: But Professor is the real deal.
translation.zh: 但教授货真价实

translation.en: One of these three guys right here will be sent home tonight.
translation.zh: （盐湖城 丹佛） 这里的三个小伙子当中 会有一位被送回家

translation.en: Every elimination game, magic would happen.
translation.zh: 每次淘汰赛中都会有神奇的事情发生

translation.en: [Duke] Godson! The Professor! Putting it up! Oh yeah!
translation.zh: 干儿子！教授！上篮得分！

translation.en: -Professor, I'll see you in Dallas. -Okay.
translation.zh: -教授 我们达拉斯见 -好的

translation.en: -All right? Be good. -All right.
translation.zh: 好吗？加油

translation.en: It's a little bit of pressure, but that's what it's about.
translation.zh: 确实有点压力 但意义就在这里

translation.en: 'Cause this contract will change somebody's life.
translation.zh: 一份合同能够改变某个人的人生

translation.en: What's up, man?
translation.zh: 你好吗 兄弟？

translation.en: -[Gee Lock] Professor, you going home? -No. I ain't going nowhere.
translation.zh: -教授 你今天回家吗？ -我哪儿也不去

translation.en: I'm just… Go out there. Do my thing.
translation.zh: 我只会上场 做自己的事情

translation.en: I'm just gonna keep doing what I've done every game that's got me to this point.
translation.zh: 我会继续做自己一直在做的 让我走到这一步的事情

translation.en: [Duke] Yeah. Look at the hold on Headache.
translation.zh: （孟菲斯 新奥尔良） 没错 看看他如何突破头痛

translation.en: Oh yeah! Oh yeah! Yeah! Yeah!
translation.zh: 噢耶！

translation.en: Yeah, baby!
translation.zh: 耶 宝贝！

translation.en: [The Professor] The last stop was Linden, New Jersey.
translation.zh: 最后一站是新泽西的林登

translation.en: This court right here is basically the genesis. This is where it started.
translation.zh: 这个球场就是诞生地 是一切起源的地方

translation.en: Go ahead and play to 21.
translation.zh: 你们先去打比赛

translation.en: Then after that, the team's gonna get together.
translation.zh: 之后 球队的人会聚在一起

translation.en: We're gonna make a decision.
translation.zh: 我们要做决定了

translation.en: [The Professor] It was AND1 players and the contestants going against each other.
translation.zh: 所有的AND1选手和参赛者互相对抗

translation.en: You can do it on the commercial circuit, but can you do it in the hood?
translation.zh: 你可以在商业电视上做到 但你能在街头比赛里做到吗？

translation.en: Can you do it playing against us?
translation.zh: 你能在和我们的比赛中做到吗？

translation.en: Even to start that game, like, Sik Wit It got me crazy on some fake pass.
translation.zh: 甚至比赛开始时 Sik Wit It的一些假传就让我抓狂

translation.en: I mean, I was like, "Dang." Like, I know I'm definitely behind now.
translation.zh: 我心想：“我靠” 我知道自己现在落后了

translation.en: And then a couple plays later, I'd block a shot.
translation.zh: 比了几分钟后 我做了个盖帽

translation.en: Hit some shots.
translation.zh: 投进了几个球

translation.en: Played really well, but so did the other guys.
translation.zh: 我打得挺顺利 但其他人也一样

translation.en: [Duke] Professor. Hot Sauce. Hot Sauce. Professor.
translation.zh: 教授、辣酱 辣酱、教授

translation.en: -[Duke] That's the game! -[man] That's it!
translation.zh: 这才叫比赛！

translation.en: When they go to the final vote, I didn't think I would get the votes.
translation.zh: 他们进行最终投票时 我觉得自己应该不会被选

translation.en: [Half Man Half Amazing] I wanna tell y'all congratulations
translation.zh: 我想再次恭喜你们所有人

translation.en: that the man to get this contract is gonna be…
translation.zh: 获得这份合约的人是…

translation.en: El Professor.
translation.zh: 教授

translation.en: -Okay? -Thanks, man.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -谢啦 兄弟

translation.en: [Half Man Half Amazing] Gonna be that man.
translation.zh: 你成功了

translation.en: I couldn't believe it. It was a dream come true.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信 简直是梦想成真

translation.en: I had put in all this hard work, and now I'm an AND1 streetballer.
translation.zh: 我付出了这么多努力 现在成了AND1街头球员

translation.en: Checking out the first episode. Looks pretty good.
translation.zh: 看了第一集的内容 看起来挺不错

translation.en: [Seth] When the TV show on ESPN came out,
translation.zh: ESPN的电视节目播出后

translation.en: I wasn't, quite frankly, even sure if people would watch.
translation.zh: 说实话 我并不确定大家会看

translation.en: [reporter] Yo, the line is not down the block. It is the block.
translation.zh: 哟 排队等候的人挤满了整个街区

translation.en: Like, open up the door, bam!
translation.zh: 一打开门 简直了！

translation.en: Shane, Shane, Shane! Man, man, man!
translation.zh: 沙恩！兄弟！

translation.en: Wow. This is something. People were going crazy.
translation.zh: 简直太了不得了 大家都很狂热

translation.en: We out here, mad love. Mad love out here.
translation.zh: 我们出名了 太疯狂了  太热情了

translation.en: -Give me your headband! Give me something! -Give me your do-rag!
translation.zh: -把你的头巾给我 给我个东西！ -把你的头巾给我！

translation.en: The AND1 Mixtape Tour is coming to town this weekend.
translation.zh: 本周末 AND1录像合辑 巡回比赛会来到这里

translation.en: -[anchor] Who's that guy, The Professor? -[anchor 2] Isn't he something?
translation.zh: -谁最出色？教授？ -他很棒吧？

translation.en: The fanfare was surreal because it happened for me overnight.
translation.zh: 粉丝的热情让人感觉不真实 因为对我来说 一夜之间全变了

translation.en: Thank you, sweetie! [laughing]
translation.zh: 谢谢你 亲爱的！

translation.en: America loves this kid. The ratings is going out of this world.
translation.zh: 全美的人都爱这个孩子 收视率简直太高了

translation.en: [Gee Lock] After being with the AND1 tour,
translation.zh: 在参加了AND1巡回比赛后

translation.en: he had cornrows like a black dude. He had the diamond studs in.
translation.zh: 他开始像黑人一样留着玉米辫 他开始戴钻石耳钉

translation.en: Before the game, he was talking like Opie. After the game, he was Eminem.
translation.zh: 比赛前 他说话的风格是奥比泰勒 比赛后 他成了艾米纳姆

translation.en: It turned into the Jackson Five. That's Michael Jackson.
translation.zh: 简直变成了杰克逊五兄弟 那就是迈克尔杰克逊

translation.en: I love you, Professor!
translation.zh: （能嫁给我吗？） 我爱你 教授！

translation.en: He's only 11.
translation.zh: 他才11岁

translation.en: I remember his first groupie.
translation.zh: 我还记得他的第一个仰慕者

translation.en: I knew that would change his life.
translation.zh: 我知道这会改变他的人生

translation.en: Hold on.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: I was a really shy kid in high school, but I definitely embraced it, you know?
translation.zh: 高中时 我是个很害羞的孩子 但我绝对欢迎这种改变

translation.en: The ESPN show, it just put us out there on a whole nother level.
translation.zh: ESPN的节目 让我们的知名度又上升了一个层次

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] NBA players and celebrities, they was loving it.
translation.zh: NBA的粉丝和明星们也超爱我们

translation.en: In case you didn't see that move, rewind it back.
translation.zh: 如果你错过了那个瞬间 那就倒回去再看一遍

translation.en: AND1 Mixtape Tour! I love this game!
translation.zh: AND1录像合辑巡回比赛！ 我爱这个比赛！

translation.en: At that point, we started to charge money for people to come to a game,
translation.zh: 那时候 我们开始向 前来看比赛的人们收取费用

translation.en: and we were selling out NBA venues.
translation.zh: 我们在NBA球场的票销售一空

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] A couple of arenas we went to,
translation.zh: 其中一些球场里

translation.en: we had more fans in that arena than they had for their own home team.
translation.zh: 来看我们的球迷人数 要比他们主队的球迷人数还多

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] I'll never forget.
translation.zh: 我永远忘记不了

translation.en: We're in the club, and I see the Detroit Pistons
translation.zh: 我们在俱乐部里 我看到底特律活塞队

translation.en: just won their second NBA championship,
translation.zh: 刚刚赢得了他们的第二个NBA冠军

translation.en: and I'm telling the DJ, "Yo, Chauncey Billups is here."
translation.zh: 我告诉DJ说： “哟 昌西比卢普斯来了”

translation.en: [commentator] Chauncey Billups, a likely candidate for the MVP Award.
translation.zh: 昌西比卢普斯 最有可能获得“最有价值球员”的人

translation.en: And then the DJ looked at me and says, "Man, fuck them. Y'all here."
translation.zh: 结果那个DJ看着我说： “兄弟 去他们的 你们才是主角”

translation.en: [Duke] You know about it. You heard about it.
translation.zh: 你们都知道 你们都听说过

translation.en: Now we're taking it to the next level. Now it's time to take it across the water.
translation.zh: 现在我们要更进一步 我们要把这些带到对岸去

translation.en: This is a global invasion.
translation.zh: 这是一场全球入侵

translation.en: Our first international tour, I mean, it was shocking.
translation.zh: 我们的首次全球巡回比赛让人震惊

translation.en: It was actually bigger than the United States. Like, actually way bigger.
translation.zh: 居然比美国的规模还大 而且大得多

translation.en: -Make some noise, Tokyo! -[crowd roars]
translation.zh: 东京 给我们一些欢呼吧！

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] This is the AND1 Mixtape Tour.
translation.zh: 这是AND1录像合辑巡回比赛

translation.en: Right now, Australian zoo. Me and my homie the koala right now.
translation.zh: 现在我和我的考拉兄弟 正在澳大利亚的动物园里

translation.en: Now, everything was first class. We're staying in the Ritz-Carlton.
translation.zh: 这时候 一切都很奢华了 我们会住在丽兹卡尔顿酒店

translation.en: These guys was rock star shit.
translation.zh: 这些家伙就像摇滚明星

translation.en: [Gee Lock] So, dudes used to go to the autographs
translation.zh: 那些家伙会举办签名会

translation.en: 'cause chicks was gonna fucking swarm.
translation.zh: 因为姑娘们会一拥而上

translation.en: [speaking indistinctly] Go to Hot Sauce.
translation.zh: 那是维利吗？去拍辣酱

translation.en: I love him.
translation.zh: 我爱他

translation.en: [woman] AND1, baby.
translation.zh: （爱你AO 操我） AND1 宝贝

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] We had guys come up with their wives.
translation.zh: 有些人会带着老婆来

translation.en: There's nothing to sign, and she pulls her titty out,
translation.zh: 因为没有东西来签名 她亮出了自己的胸部

translation.en: and it's like, "You want me to sign your wife's titty?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你想让我 在你老婆的胸上签名？”

translation.en: AND1 tour? We're partying, drinking, smoking.
translation.zh: AND1巡回比赛？ 全是派对、喝酒、抽烟

translation.en: [Gee Lock] They had a camera. They be like, "Yo. We got the night cam."
translation.zh: 他们有摄像机 然后说：“我们有夜景摄像机”

translation.en: And I'm like, "What y'all looking at?"
translation.zh: 我说：“你们看什么？”

translation.en: It was all of them having a massive orgy with some bad chick!
translation.zh: 他们所有人和某个小坏妞 在搞大规模群交！

translation.en: I was like, "Yo! I seen her at the game!"
translation.zh: 我说：“哟 我在比赛时见过她

translation.en: "Damn!" [laughing]
translation.zh: 我靠！”

translation.en: [chuckling] He lying. No, just-- [laughing]
translation.zh: -他说谎 -没有 我…

translation.en: He just joking again.
translation.zh: 他在开玩笑呢

translation.en: The AND1 groove, it was so fast that nobody could stop us.
translation.zh: AND1的节奏 实在是太快了 没人能阻挡我们

translation.en: The AND1 Mixtape Tour, presented by Mountain Dew.
translation.zh: AND1巡回比赛 由激浪赞助推出

translation.en: [Jay] Now we've got sponsors coming in.
translation.zh: 现在我们开始有了赞助商

translation.en: Took it from the streets, to the arenas, to video games.
translation.zh: 从街头到球场 再到电玩游戏

translation.en: [Seth] My team showed me a stat one day
translation.zh: （找到你的节奏） 有一天 我的团队给我看一个数据

translation.en: that Streetball was the number one male-rated TV show on ESPN.
translation.zh: 说《街头篮球》是ESPN 男性收视率最高的节目

translation.en: I'm like, "Fuck you, man. Like, stop."
translation.zh: 我说：“去你的吧 别扯了”

translation.en: And they said, "Streetball is the number one TV show
translation.zh: 他们说：“《街头篮球》是ESPN电台

translation.en: for male teens on ESPN."
translation.zh: 男性青少年收视率最高的节目”

translation.en: I was like, "Holy F."
translation.zh: 我说：“卧槽”

translation.en: [man] What's up?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: With the Mixtape Tour becoming a huge breakout success…
translation.zh: 巡回比赛获得了巨大的成功后

translation.en: We went from 15 to 70 people within a two or three-year period.
translation.zh: 我们在两三年的时间内 就从15人增长到了70人

translation.en: We made a decision for a long-term space.
translation.zh: 我们做了一个长期发展的决定

translation.en: So, the office had to have a basketball court.
translation.zh: 所以办公室里必须有一个篮球场

translation.en: [Jay] Now we're a big national brand, how do we expand our footprint?
translation.zh: 现在我们成了全国知名的品牌 我们该如何扩展足迹？

translation.en: So we decided we're gonna take one more shot on shoes.
translation.zh: 于是我们决定 我们要再试一次 球鞋

translation.en: [Jay] The first Marbury shoe was ugly, heavy, overpriced.
translation.zh: 马布里的第一双球鞋 难看又沉重 而且定价过高

translation.en: And that problem lied with me,
translation.zh: 这个问题的责任在于我

translation.en: as the person who was overseeing that product.
translation.zh: 毕竟监督那款产品的人是我

translation.en: I was always giving Jay notes, like,
translation.zh: 我总会给杰伊提建议

translation.en: "Hey, Jay, you should do this. Jay, you should do that."
translation.zh: “杰伊 你应该这样做”

translation.en: And Jay's like, "Tom, I am sick of you telling me the stuff you could do."
translation.zh: 然后杰伊说：“汤姆 你总是告诉我怎样做 我受够了

translation.en: "Do you wanna give it a shot?"
translation.zh: 你想不想自己试试？”

translation.en: I was maybe 25, and I was like, "Yeah." Like, I didn't have a doubt.
translation.zh: 我当时大概25岁 我随即同意了 我一点儿都不怀疑自己

translation.en: I had a really clear idea of what a basketball shoe should be.
translation.zh: 我很清楚篮球鞋应该是什么样子

translation.en: Shoes should be light. They should be fast.
translation.zh: 鞋应该很轻便 能让人跑得快

translation.en: They should be airy, like running shoes.
translation.zh: 应该透气性好 就像跑步鞋一样

translation.en: And we should use meshes and composites.
translation.zh: 我们应该使用网格和复合材料

translation.en: My first idea was slip-on shoes, called the Post-Game.
translation.zh: 我的第一个设计想法是无系带鞋 叫做“比赛后”

translation.en: [man] I mean, it's a whole other level now.
translation.zh: 现在完全不是一个水平了

translation.en: They're bringing it, and then we're loving it.
translation.zh: 他们带来了新鞋 我们超爱

translation.en: I mean, keep doing what you're doing.
translation.zh: 继续做你们在做的事情吧

translation.en: When I was a kid, people would wear two different shoes just for fashion.
translation.zh: 我小时候流行的风尚是 人们会穿两只不同的鞋

translation.en: That was the inspiration for the Tai Chi.
translation.zh: 这正是“太极”的灵感来源

translation.en: Visual-wise, you see the different colors. Like you're wearing different shoes.
translation.zh: 视觉上看 有两种不同的颜色 就好像穿了两只不同的鞋

translation.en: -Hey! What's up? -What's up?
translation.zh: -嘿 -嘿 你好吗？

translation.en: I remember the feeling of shock when those Tai Chis flew off the shelves.
translation.zh: 我还记得太极热卖时 那种震惊的感受

translation.en: [man] This is a really dope look.
translation.zh: 外观简直太酷了

translation.en: Whoo! Fire on these.
translation.zh: 让人着迷

translation.en: One of the best basketball shoes, period.
translation.zh: 是最棒的篮球鞋之一 绝对的

translation.en: [Seth] It became AND1's all-time best-selling shoe.
translation.zh: 它成为了AND1有史以来最畅销的鞋

translation.en: That product went from 0 to 65 million in 18 months.
translation.zh: 在18个月内 产品销售量从零增长到6500万

translation.en: [The Main Event] It started with the trash-talking shirts.
translation.zh: （“时尚又出色”） 从嘴炮T恤开始做起的企业 现在完全进入了另一个层面

translation.en: Now it's on a whole other level.
translation.zh: 从嘴炮T恤开始做起的企业 现在完全进入了另一个层面

translation.en: Every shoe company, we're coming.
translation.zh: 所有的鞋子公司 我们来了

translation.en: You see the neighborhood hustlers and drug dealers.
translation.zh: 你能看到街边的混混和毒贩

translation.en: They're wearing the AND1.
translation.zh: 都穿着AND1

translation.en: [Tom] We had styles that would either outsell Nike or be number two to them.
translation.zh: 我们有的款式 要么销量超过耐克 要么仅次于耐克

translation.en: [Tom] You know, if you're going up against Nike,
translation.zh: 如果你要和耐克竞争

translation.en: they have 50 times more people in every department.
translation.zh: 他们每个部门的员工都比我们多50倍

translation.en: And when they go and make a marquee shoe for Michael Jordan,
translation.zh: 他们为迈克尔乔丹制作战靴时

translation.en: they may take several years.
translation.zh: 可能要花上好几年的时间

translation.en: And we have, like, five dudes on design. [chuckling]
translation.zh: 而我们只有五个人负责设计

translation.en: Sometimes Tom would be in his office for, like, three days.
translation.zh: 有时候 汤姆会在办公室里待上三天

translation.en: [Tom] I logged long hours, but I really loved it.
translation.zh: 我会工作很久 但我真的很热爱

translation.en: That energy was infectious to the rest of us.
translation.zh: 这种能量感染了我们其他人

translation.en: [anchor] Jordan's have sprung from the creative partnership of shoe designer Tinker Hatfield.
translation.zh: 乔丹鞋源自鞋子设计师 汀克哈特菲尔德的创意合作

translation.en: [Jay] In a time where designers become their own celebrities,
translation.zh: 在那个设计师们都成为名人的时代

translation.en: Tom was super low-key, never wanted to have his name out there.
translation.zh: 汤姆是超级低调的 从来不想让自己的名字出现

translation.en: But he was one of the most incredibly creative designers.
translation.zh: 但他是最具创意的设计师之一

translation.en: I'm running my little kingdom. Just gonna generate high-quality shoes,
translation.zh: 我在主宰自己的小王国 我只想生产高质量的鞋子

translation.en: and if I keep doing my job, we're gonna beat Nike.
translation.zh: 只要继续做我的工作 我们就会打败耐克

translation.en: [Duke] Playing at Madison Square Garden, the mecca.
translation.zh: 在麦迪逊广场花园比赛 那可是朝圣胜地

translation.en: You know that I was hyped.
translation.zh: 我肯定是超级兴奋

translation.en: [The Main Event] The anticipation was crazy.
translation.zh: 那种期待感太疯狂了

translation.en: [The Main Event] I'm looking around like,
translation.zh: 我看着周围 心想：“我靠”

translation.en: "Damn, this is what it would have been like in the NBA?"
translation.zh: 这就是打NBA比赛的感觉吗？

translation.en: We're in their same locker room. It's the same atmosphere.
translation.zh: 我们坐在同一个更衣室里 享受着同样的气氛

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to New York City!
translation.zh: 欢迎来到纽约城！

translation.en: Took me 25 years to get here. I'm ready to cry.
translation.zh: 我花了25年的时间走到这一步 我准备好加冕了

translation.en: I'm feeling this. I'm really feeling this.
translation.zh: 我能感受到 真的可以感受到

translation.en: [The Main Event] Out of all the games we wanted to win, we wanted to win at Madison Square Garden
translation.zh: 在所有比赛里 我们最想赢的 就是在麦迪逊广场花园的比赛

translation.en: because at the end of the day, you definitely want to win where you from.
translation.zh: 因为说到底 你肯定想在自己出身的地方获胜

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] I'm actually on the NBA floor, scared as hell.
translation.zh: 我站在NBA的赛场上 吓得要死

translation.en: But you would never know it, walking around shaking your head,
translation.zh: 但你肯定不知道 你摇着头走来走去

translation.en: like, "Yeah, Sauce, you about to kill,"
translation.zh: 心想：“没错 辣酱 你要绝杀他们”

translation.en: and deep down inside, I'm scared as a motherfucker, boy.
translation.zh: 内心深处 我简直吓得要死

translation.en: I'm scared as hell.
translation.zh: 我真的超级害怕

translation.en: [Gee Lock] You had dreams of going to the NBA, you already felt like you made it
translation.zh: 你有加入NBA的梦想 你感觉自己已经做到了

translation.en: because here's your name on the big scoreboard.
translation.zh: 因为你的名字就出现在记分牌上

translation.en: Here's your name in bright lights.
translation.zh: 你的名字映照在灯光下

translation.en: I'm playing in front of thousands of people.
translation.zh: 我要在上万人面前打球

translation.en: Boy, when we played on to that old-school Madison Square Garden court?
translation.zh: 我们在老派的 麦迪逊广场花园球场打球时

translation.en: That bring a tear to your eye. That emotional.
translation.zh: 那种感觉让你热泪盈眶 真的很感人

translation.en: That was our bragging rights to our family, to our friends on,
translation.zh: 这是我们向家人和朋友炫耀的资本

translation.en: "No. We didn't make the NBA, but we made it."
translation.zh: “我们没能进入NBA 但我们做到了”

translation.en: [announcer] Are you ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: [Duke] Professor! Alley-oop!
translation.zh: 教授 空中接力！

translation.en: -Oh yeah! Yeah! -[crowd shouting, cheering]
translation.zh: 哦耶！

translation.en: It was ridiculous. I couldn't believe it.
translation.zh: 真的太荒诞了 我不敢相信

translation.en: It took so much time and energy to get here.
translation.zh: 我们花了这么长时间 这么多精力 才走到这一步

translation.en: [Duke] Oh baby! It's Sizzle and The Pharmacist.
translation.zh: 宝贝啊 是辣酱和药剂师

translation.en: The New York game was a competitive game.
translation.zh: 纽约这场比赛很激烈

translation.en: It was unlike all of most of our other games.
translation.zh: 和我们大多数其他比赛都不同

translation.en: [Duke] Jump shot, 15-footer, nothing but the bottom of the net on.
translation.zh: 跳投 四米高 球直接空心入网

translation.en: Helicopter. Looking at it. Bounce pass. Watch this!
translation.zh: 直升机 瞧瞧他 炸弹传球 快看啊！

translation.en: In Madison Square Garden, if there's enough excitement,
translation.zh: 在麦迪逊广场花园 你要是问观众够不够兴奋

translation.en: the building shakes. Half the block shakes.
translation.zh: 整个球场都在颤抖 半条街区都在颤抖

translation.en: [Duke] Looking to change. Professor. AO!
translation.zh: 花样过人 教授 AO！

translation.en: No matter who's on the floor, we gotta keep this intensity.
translation.zh: 无论球场上是谁 我们必须都得保持分数

translation.en: [Duke] That jump shot is good!
translation.zh: 跳投太棒了！

translation.en: Oh gravy!
translation.zh: 轻松得分！

translation.en: This is The Main Event! Man.
translation.zh: 大人物来了！

translation.en: You done hit a jump shot in front of 19,000 people at the mecca.
translation.zh: 你在朝圣胜地 在一万九千名观众面前跳投得分 没有什么能比这更好的了

translation.en: You can't get no better than that.
translation.zh: 在一万九千名观众面前跳投得分 没有什么能比这更好的了

translation.en: [The Main Event] I met AND1 when I was 26 years old.
translation.zh: 我26岁的时候遇到了AND1

translation.en: That bulk of my NBA days was over,
translation.zh: 我对NBA的大部分憧憬已经结束了

translation.en: but my story, in a nutshell, is that I never gave up.
translation.zh: 但简单地说 我的故事就是从未放弃

translation.en: [Duke] New York City!
translation.zh: 纽约城！

translation.en: If you like what you see, then make some noise!
translation.zh: 如果你喜欢眼前的一切 那就欢呼吧！

translation.en: [Duke] Let's give it up for both these ball clubs!
translation.zh: 我们为双方球员热烈欢呼一下！

translation.en: You got it. You can get it.
translation.zh: 你可以的 你没问题

translation.en: -[man] Tell me about playing it, though. -Hey, man…
translation.zh: -跟我说说比赛吧 -嘿 兄弟

translation.en: That shit was fun, man.
translation.zh: 真的太有意思了

translation.en: Let's get in, man.
translation.zh: 来加油吧

translation.en: -One, two, three, AND1. -[all] AND1!
translation.zh: 一 二 三 AND1

translation.en: [commentator] So we're ready for the first slam dunk competition in three years.
translation.zh: 我们已经准备好开始 三年来的第一场灌篮大赛

translation.en: The last time…
translation.zh: 上一次…

translation.en: Never forget watching the dunk contest with Vince Carter,
translation.zh: 永远忘不了 观看文斯卡特参加的灌篮大赛

translation.en: who later signed with Nike.
translation.zh: 他后来和耐克签约了

translation.en: [commentator 1] …and here is the man that this crowd wants to see.
translation.zh: 观众们都翘首企盼的人终于来了

translation.en: Vince Carter with his first dunk!
translation.zh: 文斯卡特的第一个大灌篮！

translation.en: [commentator 2] Let's go home!
translation.zh: 大声欢呼吧！

translation.en: And Vince has maybe the best performance ever
translation.zh: 文斯穿着AND1太极 参加的那次灌篮大赛

translation.en: in a dunk contest in AND1 Tai Chis.
translation.zh: 可能是有史以来表现最出色的一次

translation.en: Watching it blew our minds.
translation.zh: 他的表现让我们难以置信

translation.en: We pretty much lose our cool, right? It's like, "This is awesome."
translation.zh: 我们已经无法再冷静了 真的太精彩了

translation.en: And he did things that nobody thought were even possible.
translation.zh: 他的动作 所有人都认为不可能做到

translation.en: While wearing our product.
translation.zh: 而他穿着我们的产品

translation.en: We were like, "Thank you so much for wearing our shoes for free."
translation.zh: 我们想：“感谢你免费穿我们的鞋”

translation.en: [Tom] That was the peak of AND1, you know?
translation.zh: 那是AND1的巅峰时期

translation.en: And I think it was literally like two or three months later.
translation.zh: 然后就在两三个月后吧

translation.en: I turned on the TV.
translation.zh: 我打开了电视

translation.en: I heard a ball bouncing. Boom. Ba-boom. Ba-boom, boom, boom.
translation.zh: 看到有篮球在跳动

translation.en: -[man grunting] -[Seth] And I see the logo.
translation.zh: 我看到了那个标志

translation.en: The first word that entered my brain was "fuck."
translation.zh: 然后脑海里 出现的第一个词就是“妈的”

translation.en: It's Nike.
translation.zh: 是耐克

translation.en: Freestyle is all about hip-hop, streetball, and self-expression.
translation.zh: （耐克“街舞风雷”） “街舞风雷”广告在宣传 嘻哈、街头篮球和自我表达

translation.en: They've co-opted our streetball positioning
translation.zh: 他们利用了我们的街球定位

translation.en: with this incredibly beautifully shot TV campaign.
translation.zh: 拍摄了一个非常精美的电视广告

translation.en: I mean, that was a good spot.
translation.zh: 那个广告做得很好

translation.en: It's got an attitude. Hip-hop beat to it.
translation.zh: 宣扬了一种态度 伴随着嘻哈节奏

translation.en: But it's Nike, and they're better than that. They're copying us.
translation.zh: 但那是耐克 他们在抄袭我们 他们不应该这么做

translation.en: [Jay] That TV commercial achieved more in 30 seconds
translation.zh: 那个电视广告 在短短30秒里达到的成就

translation.en: than we did over five years of the Mixtape.
translation.zh: 超越了我们五年来 《录像合辑》所达到的成就

translation.en: Gotta be the shoes. Nike surging.
translation.zh: 耐克的球鞋热卖

translation.en: [reporter 1] Investors came running back to Nike.
translation.zh: 投资者又回到了耐克的怀抱

translation.en: It's living up to its motto. "Just Do It."
translation.zh: 它践行着自己的座右铭 “只管去做”

translation.en: [reporter 2] Just taking over this whole streetball game.
translation.zh: 他们彻底抢走了整个街头篮球的游戏

translation.en: They took our movement,
translation.zh: 他们抢走我们的运动

translation.en: put a nice shiny satin bow on it with some glitter, and called it theirs.
translation.zh: 在上面放了个漂亮的蝴蝶结 撒了些亮片 然后说是他们的

translation.en: They basically crushed us in the snap of a finger.
translation.zh: 他们不费吹灰之力就把我们打倒了

translation.en: [narrator] In a fight for glory, heart is mandatory.
translation.zh: 在荣耀的战斗中 必须用心才行

translation.en: Nike Underground's King of the Court. Sundays at 8:00 pm, 7:00 central on MTV2.
translation.zh: 耐克地下球场之王 周日晚上8点 中部时区7点 MTV2频道

translation.en: I don't know if they spent 10 million, 20 million, 50 million behind it.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们花了多少钱 一千万、两千万还是五千万

translation.en: I know when I saw that TV commercial that I realized,
translation.zh: 我只知道 看到这个广告时 我就意识到：“我靠

translation.en: "Shit. We don't have time to wait. Let's go."
translation.zh: 我只知道 看到这个广告时 我就意识到：“我靠 我们不能坐视不管

translation.en: "We gotta make some decisions. We gotta move."
translation.zh: 我们必须快点做出决定 我们得行动”

translation.en: I'm on TV!
translation.zh: 我上电视了！

translation.en: [producer] How would you respond to someone who felt that the company
translation.zh: 如果有人认为 公司的财富

translation.en: built its wealth off the back of the players?
translation.zh: 是靠球员积累起来的 你对此怎么想呢？

translation.en: How would I respond
translation.zh: 我如何回应

translation.en: to somebody feeling like the players was exploited by the company?
translation.zh: 那些认为球员被公司剥削的人？

translation.en: I would say, "I know the company was making a lot of money."
translation.zh: 我会说：“我知道公司赚了很多钱”

translation.en: After the games, you see the merchandise booth.
translation.zh: 比赛结束后 你会看到商品摊位

translation.en: Mad units with they faces on it, right?
translation.zh: 很多出售的商品上面 都印着球员的名字 对吧？

translation.en: [man] We sold out again.
translation.zh: 我们又卖光了

translation.en: [Gee Lock] Players be like, "Yo. I ain't get paid for that."
translation.zh: 球员会想：“哟 这可没给我付钱”

translation.en: It was the downfall of everything.
translation.zh: 这是衰败的开始

translation.en: [woman] We're at the warehouse.
translation.zh: 这里是仓库 我们在仓库接收、运输和包装

translation.en: We receive, ship, and pack, uh, the AND1 product for everyone.
translation.zh: 这里是仓库 我们在仓库接收、运输和包装 所有人的AND1产品

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Up at 8:00 just to meet the people in the warehouse.
translation.zh: 我早上8点起床 就为了和仓库的人见面

translation.en: Courtesy.
translation.zh: 为了礼节

translation.en: How many courtesy things are we gonna do?
translation.zh: 我们还得做多少礼节性的活动？

translation.en: This company was making millions and millions of dollars.
translation.zh: 这家公司赚了成百上千万的钱

translation.en: But we the ones who make the money for y'all.
translation.zh: 但给你们带来收入的人是我们

translation.en: It started becoming a thing that we're gettin' pizza,
translation.zh: 大家开始意识到 我们只吃披萨

translation.en: but we go on a staff bus,
translation.zh: 我们要坐员工大巴

translation.en: they got everything.
translation.zh: 他们却什么都有

translation.en: They got filet mignon, calamari, seltzer water,
translation.zh: 他们能吃菲力牛排、炸鱿鱼、苏打水

translation.en: all the good shit.
translation.zh: 全是好东西

translation.en: What are you eating, Shane?
translation.zh: 你在吃什么 沙恩？

translation.en: Before the game, uh,
translation.zh: 比赛前

translation.en: Buca shrimp parmesan.
translation.zh: 布卡餐厅的鲜虾芝士

translation.en: [Chris] A lot of guys would say, "You got to take care of us."
translation.zh: 很多人会说：“你们得照顾我们

translation.en: "Why are we not eating?"
translation.zh: 为什么我们没有那些东西？

translation.en: "Wouldn't be no tour if there were no players."
translation.zh: 没有球员 就不会有巡回比赛”

translation.en: Because you're not wrong. Like, y'all should be eating,
translation.zh: 你没错 你也该享受这些

translation.en: but you don't gotta be so aggressive with it.
translation.zh: 但你不该这样咄咄逼人

translation.en: [Headache] I'm throwing it… I'm throwing it on their bus.
translation.zh: 我要扔到他们的大巴上

translation.en: [Duke] It's over now.
translation.zh: 结束了

translation.en: He throws a hot pizza on the tour manager's face!
translation.zh: 他把热披萨扔到了巡回赛经理的脸上

translation.en: [Headache] Tell her what I said. Tell her she got one more time.
translation.zh: 告诉她我说的话 告诉她 她还有一次机会

translation.en: I'll smack the shit out of her. I'm dead serious.
translation.zh: 我会揍扁她 我是认真的

translation.en: [producer] How did you guys decide which players would be making
translation.zh: 你们如何决定哪些球员赚多少钱

translation.en: a certain amount of money over others?
translation.zh: 谁会比其他人赚得多？

translation.en: Not me. The only… The only conversation I ever got involved with
translation.zh: 不是我决定 我唯一参与过的对话

translation.en: was with Sauce and his agent.
translation.zh: 是和辣酱还有他的经纪人

translation.en: It's my hometown. Still go down.
translation.zh: 这是我的家乡 依然有反响

translation.en: [Seth] He says, "Hey, Seth. You're a really nice guy."
translation.zh: 他说：“嘿 塞斯 你真的是个好人”

translation.en: I think to myself, "Yes, I am, motherfucker."
translation.zh: 我心想：“没错 我是好人 混蛋”

translation.en: He says, "Hey. Sauce wants this, or he's gonna go to Reebok."
translation.zh: 他说：“辣酱想要这些 不然他就会去锐步”

translation.en: I was like, "Let him go to Reebok, bro."
translation.zh: 我说：“那就让他去锐步”

translation.en: Reebok's gonna kill that dude's career. Nobody wants to be with Reebok.
translation.zh: 锐步会结束那家伙的职业生涯 没人想和锐步合作

translation.en: It was interesting 'cause there really wasn't a pay structure.
translation.zh: 挺有意思的 因为他们并没有薪酬结构

translation.en: Main Event was like 90 to 100.
translation.zh: 大人物每个赛季能挣九万到十万

translation.en: And AO was around that, 80 to 90.
translation.zh: AO大概是八万到九万

translation.en: Half Man was between like 60 and 75.
translation.zh: 半人半神在六万到七万五之间

translation.en: We had lower-tier guys that were getting like 15.
translation.zh: 我们也有一些低薪的球员 大概挣一万五左右

translation.en: But that's for three months of work.
translation.zh: 但那是三个月的薪水

translation.en: Because by the time September rolled around, there is no more tours.
translation.zh: 因为到了九月份 就没有巡回比赛了

translation.en: But we would judge guys on who got the most "oohs" and "ahs,"
translation.zh: 但我们的评判标准 是看谁得到的反响最大

translation.en: and obviously, Hot Sauce was the man.
translation.zh: 显然辣酱是最热门的

translation.en: It was plenty of moments of dudes feeling frustrated,
translation.zh: 很多时候 他们会感到沮丧

translation.en: of not making enough money as somebody else was making.
translation.zh: 没能像别人那样赚到足够多的钱

translation.en: But on the AND1 tours, best to not tell nobody how much you getting,
translation.zh: 在AND1巡回赛中 最好不要告诉别人你赚了多少钱

translation.en: but they gonna say it because they like stunting on each other.
translation.zh: 但他们会说出来 因为他们喜欢抢噱头

translation.en: Let's go, baby.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: Dollars, dollars, dollars. Yeah.
translation.zh: 美元 没错
